sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import Textarea from './'

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"textarea"}}>{`Textarea`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={Textarea} />
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basic-usage"}}>{`Basic usage`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={1} __code={`<Textarea
  label="Label"
  onSubmit={() => null}
  placeholder="textarea"
  refInput="this.inputRef"
  required
  rows={4}
/>
<Textarea
  clean
  label="Textarea with label"
  onSubmit={() => null}
  placeholder="textarea"
  refInput="this.inputRef"
  required
  rows={3}
/>`} __scope={{props,Textarea}}>
  <Textarea
    label="Label"
    onSubmit={() => null}
    placeholder="textarea"
    refInput="this.inputRef"
    required
    rows={4}
  />
  <Textarea
    clean
    label="Textarea with label"
    onSubmit={() => null}
    placeholder="textarea"
    refInput="this.inputRef"
    required
    rows={3}
  />
</Playground></MDXTag>
